page.title: 20HOME LIFE IN BROUGHTON
page.content:
HERE IS A SURVEY OF THE NUMBERS OF CHILDREN WHO OWN THESE KINDS OF PET. STICK INSECTS 3 GEESE 1 FISH 69 GUINEA PIGS 2 SHEEP 5 HENS 6 RABBITS 17 DUCKS 3 COWS 1 TORTOISES 2 HORSES 3 CATS 39 HAMSTERS 12 BIRDS 22 DOGS 52 THE THREE MOST POPULAR PETS ARE FISH, DOGS AND CATS.
THE NAMES OF THE CHILDREN FROM BROUGHTON C.P. PRIMARY SCHOOL WHO TOOK PART IN THE DOMESDAY PROJECT ARE: A.STRATFORD, D.OWEN, G.RICHES, L.MAWBY, J.ATKINSON, H.SMITH, F.SLEAFORD, T.BOSWORTH,J.WAITE, C.RATLEDGE, G.MCNALLY, M.BRADBURY, P.COLLIER, C.BUTCHER, A.CHURCH, A.LINNELL, M.THIRKILL R.ASHBY, C.MEYERS, R.WALTON, D.ASBREY, L.BRIDGSTOCK, C.JENNINGS, T.TAYLOR, M.CLARKE, V.SMITH AND S.NORTH.
